ygData.subject: RE: Selos and trains underground
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Huh, is this a lizzie only thing?  I m coulda sworn the entire camp was on me last nite when I AoE d the N Karana raiders and there are seven of them.
ygData.messageBody:
>I'm not really sure this is possible if you're alone. If you
>wade into a 5+ mob camp with your AOE songs going, you'll
>notice only 4 of them will attack you at a time. The rest
>will stay where they are and ignore you until one of the mobs
>attacking you dies.

>I suppose it could be that if they're all chasing you, then
>none of them are attacking you, so all of them can chase
>you. I'll have to try that.

Huh, is this a lizzie only thing? I'm coulda sworn the entire camp was on
me last nite when I AoE'd the N Karana raiders and there are seven of them.
Wouldn't this mean if could beat four of a given thing with Hymn keeping up,
you could beat almost unlimited numbers because only 4 would attack at once?

I know for certain I have had 12 lions, 6 bears, 2 ghouls, 3 skeletons, and
5 dervs all chasing me around W Commons when I was level 9 because the guys
at the druid ring counted as I ran screamin' past.

Kitasi
